hero.title: Welcome to
hero.description: Your web application for managing of your school's library.
hero.manage_documents: From this platform, you, dear members of the documentation unit, have the ability to manage documents and reservations automatically, with ease and peace of mind.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a range of services to enhance your library management experience.

service1.title: Book Management
service1.description: Efficiently organize books, track borrow and return statuses, and classify them by genre and section.

service2.title: Thesis Management
service2.description: Centralize academic theses, dissertations, and research documents with detailed metadata.

service3.title: User Profile Management
service3.description: Allow users to manage their information and  view history.

service4.title: Administrative Management
service4.description: Access administrative tools, configure system settings, and give dedicated support.

loans.title: Current Loans
loans.no_loans_message: When students borrow documents, they will appear here

reservations.title: Reservations List
reservations.no_reservations_message: When users reserve documents, they will appear here
reservations.validation_info: Click 'Validate Loan' to transform a reservation into an active loan

dashboard.help_message: For more details on each card, hover over it with your cursor.
dashboard.desc_unique_titles: Total number of distinct titles in the library, not counting multiple copies.
dashboard.desc_total_inventory: Total number of copies acquired by the library (sum of all initial copies).
dashboard.desc_available: Number of copies currently available for reservation or borrowing.
dashboard.desc_borrowed: Number of documents currently borrowed by users.
dashboard.desc_reserved: Number of documents reserved but not yet picked up by users.
dashboard.desc_physically_present: Number of copies physically present in the library (total inventory minus borrowed items).
dashboard.desc_people_borrowed: Number of users who currently have at least one document borrowed.
dashboard.desc_reservation_ratio: Percentage of reservations that are converted to borrowings.
